description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Lamb Steaks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb dishes,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Potato,BBQ,High protein,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Lamb Steaks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Empty spice sachet into a small bowl. Add oil, honey, garlic and lemon rind. Place lamb steaks into a shallow dish and rub all over with spice paste. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Wash and peel potatoes, place them onto the BBQ or on high heat.
Place beans into a saucepan and cool till water starts to boil.

Preheat BBQ grill on high heat for 10 minutes then reduce heat to medium-high. Cook lamb for 4-5 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Remove from heat. Cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes before serving.
Serve lamb steaks with roasted baby potatoes, green beans and lemon wedges.
